mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCTTABLE (PRODUCTNO, PRODUCTIMAGEFILE, productimageName, productimageOriName, productimageUrl, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTPRICE, PRODUCTSALESCNT, PRODUCTCID) VALUES (#{productno}, #{productimagefile}, #{productimageName}, #{productimageOriName}, #{productimageUrl}, #{productname}, #{productprice}, #{productsalescnt}, #{productid})
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCTNO, PRODUCTIMAGEFILE, productimageName, productimageOriName, productimageUrl, PRODUCTNAME,PRODUCTPRICE, PRODUCTSALESCNT, PRODUCTCID FROM PRODUCTTABLE order by PRODUCTNO desc

SELECT p.PRODUCTNO, p.PRODUCTIMAGEFILE, p.productimageName, p.productimageOriName, p.productimageUrl, p.PRODUCTNAME, p.PRODUCTPRICE, p.PRODUCTSALESCNT, p.PRODUCTCID, e.category FROM PRODUCTTABLE p Left join event e on p.PRODUCTCID = e.seq WHERE PRODUCTCID = #{productid}
SELECT count(*) as listCut FROM PRODUCTTABLE
SELECT * FROM PRODUCTTABLE WHERE productname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName}, '%')
